text.autoconfig.cropmod.title: CropMod Configuration
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.cropProte: Requires seeds in inventory to break crops.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.cameraSna: Snaps the camera to the nearest 90Â° angle when the player interacts with crops.
Determines when the camera snap should occur: always or only when breaking crops.
Determines if the camera snap should always occur or only when the player is aligned with the same row as the crop.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.itemThres: Specifies the number of seeds required in the inventory for harvesting crops.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.onlyHarve: If enabled, only fully grown crops can be harvested.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.wheatEnab: Enable all CropMod features for wheat crops.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.carrotsEn: Enable all CropMod features for carrot crops.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.potatoesE: Enable all CropMod features for potato crops.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.beetroots: Enable all CropMod features for beetroot crops.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.netherWar: Enable all CropMod features for nether wart crops.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.cocoaEnab: Enable all CropMod features for cocoa bean crops.
